---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

-2^2 * 2^4 = -4*16 = -64 + 2^30 = 1073741760 = 3FFFFFC0

01010
R10 gets 2^30 in its slices.

LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 1 - 001

LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 3 - 011

LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 5 - 101

LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 7 - 111

00101
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 6 - 110



00001 
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  0 - 000
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  2 - 010
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  4 - 100
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  6 - 110

 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode:
1000000001001010101000000 


program:

0001010000000000000001010
0011010000000000000001010
0101010000000000000001010
0111010000000000000001010
0000111111111111110000101
0010111111111111110000101
0100111111111111110000101
0110111111111111110000101
0000000000000001000000001
0010000000000001000000001
0100000000000001000000001
0110000000000001000000001
1000000001001010101000000




passes.

---------------------------------------------------
